verses.verse: A Prayer<WH8605> of David.<WH1732> Bow down<WH5186> thine ear,<WH241> O LORD<WH3068> hear<WH6030> me: for<WH3588> I<WH589> am poor<WH6041> and needy.<WH34>
Preserve <WH8104> my soul;<WH5315> for<WH3588> I<WH589> am holy:<WH2623> O thou<WH859> my God,<WH430> save<WH3467> thy servant<WH5650> that trusteth<WH982> in thee.<WH413>
Be merciful<WH2603> unto me, O Lord:<WH136> for<WH3588> I cry<WH7121> unto<WH413> thee daily.<WH3605> <WH3117>
Rejoice <WH8055> the soul<WH5315> of thy servant:<WH5650> for<WH3588> unto<WH413> thee, O Lord,<WH136> do I lift up<WH5375> my soul.<WH5315>
For <WH3588> thou,<WH859> Lord,<WH136> art good,<WH2896> and ready to forgive;<WH5546> and plenteous<WH7227> in mercy<WH2617> unto all<WH3605> them that call upon<WH7121> thee.
Give ear,<WH238> O LORD,<WH3068> unto my prayer;<WH8605> and attend<WH7181> to the voice<WH6963> of my supplications.<WH8469>
In the day<WH3117> of my trouble<WH6869> I will call upon<WH7121> thee: for<WH3588> thou wilt answer<WH6030> me.
Among the gods<WH430> there is none<WH369> like unto thee,<WH3644> O Lord;<WH136> neither<WH369> are there any works like unto thy works.<WH4639>
All <WH3605> nations<WH1471> whom<WH834> thou hast made<WH6213> shall come<WH935> and worship<WH7812> before<WH6440> thee, O Lord;<WH136> and shall glorify<WH3513> thy name.<WH8034>
For <WH3588> thou<WH859> art great,<WH1419> and doest<WH6213> wondrous things:<WH6381> thou<WH859> art God<WH430> alone.<WH905>
Teach <WH3384> me thy way,<WH1870> O LORD;<WH3068> I will walk<WH1980> in thy truth:<WH571> unite<WH3161> my heart<WH3824> to fear<WH3372> thy name.<WH8034>
I will praise<WH3034> thee, O Lord<WH136> my God,<WH430> with all<WH3605> my heart:<WH3824> and I will glorify<WH3513> thy name<WH8034> forevermore.<WH5769>
For <WH3588> great<WH1419> is thy mercy<WH2617> toward<WH5921> me: and thou hast delivered<WH5337> my soul<WH5315> from the lowest<WH8482> hell.<WH4480> <WH7585>

O God,<WH430> the proud<WH2086> are risen<WH6965> against<WH5921> me, and the assemblies<WH5712> of violent<WH6184> men have sought after<WH1245> my soul;<WH5315> and have not<WH3808> set<WH7760> thee before<WH5048> them.
But thou,<WH859> O Lord,<WH136> art a God<WH410> full of compassion,<WH7349> and gracious,<WH2587> longsuffering,<WH750> <WH639> and plenteous<WH7227> in mercy<WH2617> and truth.<WH571>
O turn<WH6437> unto<WH413> me, and have mercy<WH2603> upon me; give<WH5414> thy strength<WH5797> unto thy servant,<WH5650> and save<WH3467> the son<WH1121> of thine handmaid.<WH519>

Show <WH6213> <WH5973> me a token<WH226> for good;<WH2896> that they which hate<WH8130> me may see<WH7200> it, and be ashamed:<WH954> because<WH3588> thou,<WH859> LORD,<WH3068> hast helped<WH5826> me, and comforted<WH5162> me.
